word: der Anbisse, die There seems to be a typo in the last example. assuming it is "der anblick" instead of "der anbisse," the plural form would be "anblicke."
definition: A small, savory food item typically served as an appetizer or snack, often accompanied by drinks. It is commonly enjoyed in social gatherings or informal settings.

examples.german: Sie boten uns einen kleinen Anbiss an.
examples.english: They offered us a small appetizer.

examples.german: Der Anbiss besteht aus verschiedenen Käsesorten.
examples.english: The appetizer consists of various types of cheese.

examples.german: Er nahm sich einen Anbiss und ging dann weiter.
examples.english: He took a bite and then continued on.

examples.german: Der Anbiss wird vor dem Hauptgericht serviert.
examples.english: The appetizer is served before the main course.
